alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 2:12AM MST until March 02 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 4000 feet, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory above 3000 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55-60 mph. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Wednesday to 7 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 5 above zero could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
